title: VMC Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 200 Assistant Engineer, Work Assistant Posts
description: The Vadodara Municipal Corporation (VMC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 200 Assistant Engineer and Work Assistant Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma, B.E./B. Tech in Mechanical, Electrical, and Civil Engineering can apply for the VMC Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentio...
